name: RebajaTusCuentas
description: Making it less painful to ask for mortgages is the mission of RebajaTusCuentas. All without goin to the bank.
shortDescription: A financial platform built for scale and accessibility
subtitle: Web and responsive design
title: A financial platform  for mortgage loans

sections.description:
RebajaTusCuentas was born as Peruvian startup with the commitment to democratize access to mortgage loans in an underbanked country. It is a mortgages broker whit the support of 500 startup with presence in 3 countries and + 50M in loans granted.

It has been incredible to see the growth of RTC.

sections.title: Your customers are hungry, treat them special

items.title: The challenge
items.description: Banked people who are unaware that they can get better interest rates for their mortgages. Bearing in mind that fintech services are new and may not generate much confidence.
list: Conveying strength and confidence
Pre-approved mortgages by banks and RebajaTusCuentas
Constantly communicate the status of your process

items.title: Customer journey
list: +40 telephone interviews and video calls
A slightly long tunnel but short in time compared to a traditional bank

sections.description: Understanding users well facilitated expansion to 3 countries. In Peru, they went from being a mortgage broker to a direct mortgage provider.
